CustomField.formula: IF(Points__c >= 0 && Points__c < 200 , 'SCOUT', IF(Points__c >= 200 && Points__c < 3000 , 'HIKER', IF(Points__c >= 3000 && Points__c < 9000 , 'EXPLORER', IF(Points__c >= 9000 && Points__c < 18000 , 'ADVENTURER', IF(Points__c >= 18000 && Points__c < 35000 , 'EXPEDITIONER', 'RANGER')))) )
CustomField.label: Rank
